title: Our Team
heroDescription: Our expert team that comes together for innovative solutions and technological advancements

descriptions.mustafaEymen: Our founding leader with extensive experience in technology and management, who leads the team forward with his strategic vision.
descriptions.arifEmre: Our leader who manages operational processes, specializes in organizational structuring and process optimization, and successfully implements business strategies.
descriptions.batuhanAkkova: Our technology director who determines technology strategies, manages innovation and R&D processes, and leads the development of technical infrastructure.
descriptions.muhammedZahid: Our senior executive responsible for strategic planning and company growth goals, developing sustainable growth strategies.
descriptions.aliAktas: Our valuable leader who conducts research on space history, guiding the team with his knowledge and analytical approach.
descriptions.anilAkyol: Our lawyer leader who specializes in legal regulations and intellectual property rights in the field of space law, guiding projects within the framework of international space law.
descriptions.ahmetBilgic: Our director who manages communication strategies and media relations, playing an important role in strengthening our corporate identity.
descriptions.dorukTan: Our leader who specializes in the development and integration of avionics systems, standing out with innovative solutions.
descriptions.utkuMutlu: Our leader who specializes in the design and optimization of ballistic systems, managing technical calculations and providing analytical solutions.
descriptions.ibrahimDincsoy: Our captain who manages the ITU team, produces creative solutions to technical problems, and stands out with leadership qualities.
descriptions.ismailBoler: Our result-oriented captain at the head of the YTU team, guiding the team with his deep knowledge in engineering.
descriptions.kaanOktem: Our captain who manages software development processes, integrates modern technologies into our projects, and provides creative solutions.
descriptions.muhammedEmin: Our captain who is an expert in data analysis and performance evaluation, managing the team's statistical studies.
descriptions.mustafaErgin: Our captain at the head of the hardware team, specialized in the design and production of electronic systems, known for his detailed approach.
descriptions.asimFurkan: Our member who works on ballistic calculations and simulations, knowledgeable about materials science and production techniques.
descriptions.mehmetAffan: Our team member who works in the field of mechanical design and ballistic simulations, providing solutions with analytical thinking.
descriptions.muhennedVelid: Our valuable member who works on ballistic calculations and simulations, contributing to the team with international experience.
descriptions.mehmetAnil: Our media team member who works in the fields of video production and content development, involved in documenting events.
descriptions.omerFarukKaraoglu: Our team member who specializes in social media management and content strategies, contributing to corporate communication.
